name: Duskull

evolution.description: Duskull can evolve into Dusclops at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 13 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Requiem Pokémon. Duskull can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this Pokémon chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to ground moves.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: Upon entering a battle, a single opponent’s held item is revealed, if it has one.
